info.description: Documents API for U.S. Tax Court EF-CMS
info.title: dev-ef-cms

post.summary: create a case
post.description: Create a case.

put.summary: Updates the primary contact info on a case
put.description: Updates the primary contact info on a case.

post.description: Create a case from a paper submission.

get.summary: get a case by caseId
get.description: Get a case by caseId.

post.summary: file a new external document on a case
post.description: Creates a new external document and attaches it to a case. It will also create a work item.

post.summary: file a new docket entry on a case
post.description: Creates a new docket entry/document and attaches it to a case.

put.summary: updates a current docket entry on a case
put.description: Updates a docket entry/document and attaches it to a case.

post.summary: sends the case to the holding queue
post.description: Send a packaged case to the respondent.

delete.summary: deletes the petition on the case from the holding queue
delete.description: Deletes the petition on the case from the holding queue.

get.summary: create a pre-signed url for uploads
get.description: Create a pre-signed url for  document uploads to S3.

get.summary: redirects to the s3 url for downloading a document
get.description: Create and redirects the user to a pre-signed url for document downloads from S3.

get.summary: create a pre-signed url for downloads
get.description: Create a pre-signed url for  document downloads from S3.

post.summary: triggers the PDF sanitizer function
post.description: Endpoint that triggers the sanitize function for the specified document.

post.summary: triggers the virus scan function
post.description: Endpoint that triggers the virus scan function for the specified document.

post.summary: triggers the pdf validation function
post.description: Endpoint that triggers the PDF validation function for the specified document.

get.summary: get all cases for a user
get.description: Get all cases for a user.

post.summary: run IRS batch process
post.description: Run the (temporary) send to IRS batch process, which creates a ZIP file of petition documents and uploads it to S3.

filedBy.description: the user name who filed the document

userId.description: id of user who created the document

unprocessableEntityError.description: a unprocessable entity error (422), due to a problem in the body or the id in the url

assigneeName.description: the name of the user currently assigned the work item

messages.description: array of messages associated with the workitem

assigneeId.description: id of user currently assigned the work item

sentBy.description: the user or system function that generate or sent this original work item

payGovDate.description: the date the pay gov id was updated

documents.description: array of rawDocument ids and types associated with the case

payGovId.description: the pay gov id generated from pay.gov

respondent.description: the respondent who is associated with the case

userId.description: id of user who created the case

docketNumber.description: the unique docket number associated with the case

irsSendDate.description: the date the case was sent to the IRS

maxCases.description: max number of cases on the session

sort.description: field to sort the cases by

caseMetadata.description: map of cases to trial statuses

filters.description: trial status filters with boolean values

userId.description: id of the user who owns the note
